attributes.action: Ban the use of any mobile phone including hands free when a vehcle is in motion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Scientific evidence shows that the use of a mobile phone (of any description including hands free) whilst a vehicle is in motion leads to accident causing injury and death. Too often I have seen lorry drivers and even coach and bus drivers engaged in conversation whilst driving putting both their passengers and other road users at risk.

A complete ban must be enacted to stop this practice.
